ygData.msgSnippet: Aye Please give use the Recipe. It would be nice to have one of Karana :) Battlestaff Fuzzietoe, Mithaniel Marr 41rst Ranked Druid of Karana Master Brewer,
ygData.messageBody:
Aye Please give use the Recipe. It would be nice to have one of Karana :)

Battlestaff Fuzzietoe, Mithaniel Marr
41rst Ranked Druid of Karana
Master Brewer, Master Baker, Master Potter, Master Fletcher

-----Original Message-----
From: Truitt, Darla/SEA [mailto:dtruitt@...]
Sent: Friday, February 25, 2000 9:36 AM
To: 'EQ_Potters@onelist.com'
Subject: RE: [EQ_Potters] Re: Pottery Deities DISCOVERED!!!


From: "Truitt, Darla/SEA" <dtruitt@...>

You lucky SOB :P Wow that is great. I take it you are holding off on the
recipe a bit? there is someone in game that has been bugging me to make
deities forever. though I never got around to trying to figure it out. My
big question is....WHAT ARE THEY FOR??

Thanks! Hints are welcome :)
Tanana
Master Brewer, Potter, Beggar
